short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple Chrome extension meant to allow users to read sites quicker.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Read faster than ever by improving your brain's ability to skim text!
With this extension the beginning of every word on a web page will be bolded for you, which has been found to make speed reading easier for many people.
